JOB DESCRIPTION: Design, develop, troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc. As a member of the software engineering division, you will take an active role in the definition and evolution of standard practices and procedures. You will be responsible for defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing, designing and debugging of software applications or operating systems.    Preference:   BE, Btech, MCA      Technical Skill:     Should have STRONG experience on Core Java, Hibernate 3.x and Above, Spring 3.x and above, JSF 2.x and above, JBPM 4.4 and above, Rest web services, JSON, Java script J query, CSS, HTML5, TOMCAT JBOSSWeb logic, SVN MAVEN and Eclipse.
